name: Driving Bus Student:City Road
description:
Driving Bus Student:City Road is an outstanding game. Passenger bus driving simulator lets you to be an epic highway bus driver in passenger bus driving simulator, movement of passengers and tourists will make you feel like a real bus driver.
Features:
- Real life traffic
- Beautiful city environment
- Challenging missions
- Different grand Coach buses to drive
- Realistic Coach bus physics
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Realistic Coach bus interiors
